text: "Believer" is a single by English drum and bass producer DJ Fresh and English record producer and DJ Adam F. The song was released as a digital download on 7 June 2015 through Ministry of Sound as the sixth single from Fresh's forthcoming fourth studio album.Believer (Radio Edit) - Single by DJ Fresh & Adam F on iTunesBeliever - EP by DJ Fresh & Adam F on iTunes The song peaked to number 58 on the UK Singles Chart. The song was written by Adam Fenton, Dan Stein and Ray Keith. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Believer" was first released onto YouTube on 30 April 2015 at a total length of three minutes and fifteen seconds.DJ Fresh & Adam F - Believer (Official Video) - YouTube ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! Chart (2015) ! Peak position |- |- |} ==Release history== {|class=wikitable ! Region ! Date ! Format !
